thread.section_title: Hotel Residence Foch - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Treated like royalty, as always
thread.title_full: Treated like royalty, as always - Review of Hotel Residence Foch, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Danny K
title: Treated like royalty, as always
text: This was our second stay with the wonderful folks at Residence Foch and, as always, we were treated so kindly and warmly by the staff at this lovely hotel. We especially appreciated the helpful ways of Alexandra and Deborah, who went out of their way to insure that every detail of our stay was attended to. The location could not be better, ten minutes from the Arc de Triomphe, but on a quiet, residential street. A real gem in Paris!
